pullrequest.title: Added wrapper around root SDF for an SDF element

content.raw:
mm weird [Color.hh header file](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/e86e5bb392e44404561046c0a7597596f8385401/include/ignition/math/Color.hh?at=ignition-math3_3.2.0) should be there in ign-math3. I just tested this patch without bumping the ign-math version and it built fine for me.

Maybe `VERBOSE=1  make` will show where it's looking for the ign-math include files?
content.html:
mm weird Color.hh header file should be there in ign-math3. I just tested this patch without bumping the ign-math version and it built fine for me.

Maybe VERBOSE=1 make will show where it's looking for the ign-math include files?
